name: IMS
tagline: The Communications Firm for Latin America.
description:
Founded in 1994, IMS has established a solid reputation as communications experts in IT, Telecom, and Consumer Electronics. With headquarters in Miami, US, and strategically deployed offices in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica (Central America), Mexico, and Peru, we are more than ready to take your business to the next level.
While Public Relations remains one of our core practices, we have evolved with the industry, and today we are a communications firm that includes Content Marketing, Digital Marketing and custom tailored Events. From press announcements, to analytic bylines or social media postings, to organizing events, we have an integrated and cohesive process lead by a multilingual, multidisciplinary & multicultural team. And because transparency is relevant, each effort is accounted for and measured by, so you can optimize your strategy along the way.
